metadata.name: Roomscape 03
metadata.description:
Full Screen and Sound On!  
It only takes an open window to turn the comfort of your home into a snowy adventure. Suddenly, the painting on the wall no longer represents the memory of a painter you never knew but your mental state here and now.

"Roomscape 03" is the third piece in the "Roomscapes" series. R01 and R02 have sold a total of 1160 editions between them. There will be only 1 edition of R03.

1/1 edition | 2160x2160px | Joseba Elorza a.k.a. MiraRuido | 2023. 
Seamless Loop (web player leaves a gap that doesnâ€™t exist in the minted file)
